name: One Night In The House
description:
One Night In The House is a first-person game with an emphasis on plot.

As an Onith employee, you must fulfill the request of your friend who made a fatal mistake.
But trying to fulfill this request leads you to even greater problems.

In the first episode, you have to find a way out of the situation in which you find yourself because of your friend.

Use the phone of the main character to communicate in the messenger to search for answers.
Use the smartphone app of the protagonist "ARNote" to study notes scattered around the world to help you find a way out.
